src:
Rencana 2020 Glenn Fredly, Buka Resto dan Tur Keliling Indonesia
03 Nov 2019, 13:41 by Chitra Paramaesti, Istiqomatul Hayati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Penyanyi Glenn Fredly menjadi salah satu pembicara di acara Senyawa+ yang diselenggarakan di M Bloc, Jakarta. Glenn menuturkan salah satu pentingnya kolaborasi dalam berkesenian dan juga bisnis.
Kabarnya, Glenn bersama Trio Lestari akan membuka restoran di Jerman. "Planing sih ada, tapi belum bisa disosialisasikan," ujar Glenn di M Bloc, Minggu, 3 November 2019.
Glenn berujar, rencananya tersebut masih dalam tahap penggodokan. Namun, teman yang akan dibawa Glenn dan teman-temannya dalam berbisnis ialah santapan nusantara.
Untuk berkolaborasi, Glenn tidak menutup kemungkinan dengan siapapun, bahkan dengan pemerintah. "Yang paling penting semua porsinya jelas dan sesuai kapasitasnya," kata Glenn.
Selain itu, Glenn juga akan merayakan 25 tahun berkaryanya dengan mengeluarkan album baru dan tur keliling Indonesia. "Rencananya akan dirilis 14 November nanti," ujar dia.
Dalam proyek bermusiknya, Glenn mengatakan berkolaborasi dengan beberapa musisi lainnya. Namun, ia masih merahasiakan hal tersebut. Ia juga akan keliling Indonesia untuk merayakan ulang tahun perak karirnya.
text:
2020 Plans Glenn Fredly, Open a Resto and Tour around Indonesia
03 Nov 2019, 13:41 by Chitra Paramaesti, Istiqomatul Hayati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Singer Glenn Fredly was one of the speakers at the Compound + event held at M Bloc, Jakarta. Glenn said one of the importance of collaboration in the arts and also business.
Reportedly, Glenn with Trio Lestari will open a restaurant in Germany. "There is planing, but it cannot be socialized," said Glenn at M Bloc, Sunday, November 3, 2019.
Glenn said, the plan was still in the formulation phase. However, the friend Glenn and his friends will bring in business is the archipelago's meal.
To collaborate, Glenn did not rule out the possibility of anyone, even the government. "The most important thing is that all the portions are clear and in accordance with their capacity," said Glenn.
In addition, Glenn will also celebrate his 25 years of work by releasing a new album and a tour around Indonesia. "The plan will be released November 14," he said.
In his musical project, Glenn said he collaborated with several other musicians. However, he still kept it a secret. He will also tour Indonesia to celebrate the silver anniversary of his career.
